articles.title: Epidemiological update: SARS-CoV-2 and NB.1.8.1 variant assessment - European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control
articles.description: Increases in infections due to SARS-CoV-2, associated with an increase in detections of the NB.1.8.1 variant, have been observed in some countries in Asia (including China, Hong Kong, Singapore) in recent weeks. ECDC and WHO have classified NB.1.8.1 as a vari…
articles.content: Erik Alm, Sabrina Bacci, Eva Bons, Nick Bundle, Edoardo Colzani, Luisa Hallmaier-Wacker, Phyo Myint, Priyanka Nannapaneni, Rene Niehus, Kate Olsson, Ajibola Omokanye, Bastian Prasse, OlovSvartstrom.1… [+4942 chars]
